title: Retrieve your weekly sales statistics
description: Retrieve sales statistics for the authenticated user.
permission_required: MyTradeMeRead: Read your membership & listing data.

returns.description: Collection of <WeeklySalesItem> Statistics for the current week and the previous six weeks.

fields.name: StartDate
fields.description: The start date of the summary.

fields.name: EndDate
fields.description: The end date of the summary.

fields.name: ReserveMet
fields.description: The number of items which met their reserve price in the time period.

fields.name: BuyNow
fields.description: The number of items which were purchased via Buy Now in the time period.

fields.name: FixedPriceOffer
fields.description: The number of items which sold via a fixed price offer in the time period.

fields.name: TotalSold
fields.description: The number of items sold in the time period.

fields.name: TotalValue
fields.description: The total value of items sold in the time period.

fields.name: UnsoldItems
fields.description: The total number of items unsold in the time period.

fields.name: SellThroughRate
fields.description: The sell-through rate in the time period.
